title: Increase possible number of bits and add fading speed of symbols
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body:
Title says it all. These changes would help the wallpaper to look more abstract.
(Fading speed from 25% to 150%)

title: License?
body: Just wondering if this is free to distribute: either way it would be a good idea to make the license more explicit. If it's free I'd like to distribute it via f-droid.org. BTW, one of the gitmodules has an ssh url.
